name: Vliegschool Rotterdam Sand Air
about: Vliegschool Rotterdam Sand Air, located at Rotterdam The Hague Airport, is a boutique flying school dedicated to providing personalized flight training, aircraft hire, and scenic flights. With a focus on quality and safety, Sand Air offers a comprehensive learning environment for aspiring pilots. Our experienced instructors guide students through every step of their aviation journey, ensuring a thorough and enjoyable learning experience. Whether you're pursuing a pilot's license or simply looking to enjoy the thrill of flying, Sand Air is committed to making your aviation dreams a reality. Join us for a unique and fulfilling flying experience.
